instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281 crashes from sleep only
threads.message:
Good day guys
Have got an 820-00281 that crashes when it wakes from sleep, but this does not happen when I manually put the machine to sleep from the operating system. below are the sleep signal I measured

PP0V6_SLEEP = 06V
PP0V8_SLEEP = 08V
PP1V1_SLEEP = 1V
PP1V8_SLEEP =1.8V
SMC_LID RIGHT = 3.3V
SMC_LID RIGHT = 3.3V
HALL_SENSOR_LEFT  = 3.3V
HALL_SENSOR_RIGHT =3.3V
PLEASE HELP

threads.title: 820-00281 crashes from sleep only
threads.message: Disconnect J9600 and test with known good USB macOS.

threads.title: 820-00281 crashes from sleep only
threads.message: Forgot to mention, I tried the board in a different shell , same thing

threads.title: 820-00281 crashes from sleep only
threads.message: I did remove j9600, but it didn’t boot through external drive , came up with a critical update error

threads.title: 820-00281 crashes from sleep only
threads.message:
Disconnect touchbar and test again.
Also check what happens in safe mode.
